subject: re:Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear valued member.
You have an excellent opportunity to save money purchasing your products.
MyCanadianPharmacy offers drugs of the same quality as in American stores at really lower cost.You can save even more money using special Spring discounts.
Click here to checkhttp://cityinvent.hk
We offer a full range of modern pharmaceutical products.High level of our service will exceed your expectations. 
Yours faithfully,Jenifer Murphy
